metadata.title: Cabins Kamouraska | Nature, calm and comfort
metadata.description: Boutique getaways in Kamouraska, Quebec. Cabins and condos with views, nature and rest.

hero.title: Unplug in Kamouraska
hero.subtitle: Nature, calm and comfort in cabins and condos with St. Lawrence views.

alojamientos.title: Accommodations
alojamientos.description: Cabins and condos designed for rest, with natural materials, warm light and details that invite you to slow down.
